scripts.setup: yarn run generate && yarn run bootstrap
scripts.symlink:monaco: mkdir -p theia/node_modules && cd theia/node_modules && ln -f -s ../../node_modules/monaco-editor-core monaco-editor-core && ln -f -s ../../node_modules/monaco-editor monaco-editor && cd ../..
scripts.generate: node theia/scripts/generate.js && cd yangster-app && yo theia:browser && cd ..
scripts.update: git submodule foreach git pull origin master
